title: If there is no data for series, it should display a friendly error message to remind the user.
OB: Currently, when there is no data for a series, no error message is displayed.
EB: When there is no data for a series, a friendly error message should be displayed to remind the user.
SR: To reproduce the issue: 1. Create a chart and set the data definition. 2. Select a column that does not contain any data. 3. Observe that no error message is displayed.
